page.title: 14Law & Order Wootton Bassett
page.content: In Wootton Bassett{police station}they have one lady inspector,two sergeants, nine police constables and two dog handlers.The station has four cells, one police car,two police vans and two kennels for stray dogs.The police station is well equipped and has two court rooms. Wootton Bassett has a lot of crime, mostly vandalism. The inspector said that she has only used her handcuffs twice in the last two years.The inspector is not allowed to use a truncheon and she hates going out to road accidents.The{magistrate} only agrees with the truth drug if it is really necessary.She said that the longest prison sentence she is allowed to give is 6 months and she does not feel sad for those convicted.She became a magistrate because she wanted to serve the people of Wootton Bassett.
